ctx: intros x y z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros. unfold transitive. intros x y z H1 H2. unfold divp. destruct x as [|a l]. contradiction. destruct (H1 ltac:(auto)) as [Hx|Hx]. - destruct y as [|b k]. contradiction. destruct z as [|c m]. contradiction. apply (H2 ltac:(auto)). - apply (H2 ltac:(auto)).
